edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller
Class InputListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller.InputListenerAdapter

public class InputListenerAdapter
extends Object

Provides JSF-/view specific methods for reacting to user input. Delegates controller specific tasks to the InputListener.

Author:
Team1

Nested Class Summary
static class InputListenerAdapter.CategoryEntry
          Stores a category and a boolean indicating if the category is currently active or not.

getSearchButtonLabel

public String getSearchButtonLabel()
Returns the actual appropriate search button label.

Returns:

searchButtonPressed

public void searchButtonPressed(ActionEvent ae)
Triggers a search or route calculation after the search button has been pressed. Therefor processes the input in the input fields and/or the selections made with the proposal lists and delegates the resulting tasks to the InputListener.

Parameters:
ae - The corresponding ActionEvent.

translate

public static String translate(String key)
EL-Function that can be used in the JSF-site. Uses the function "tr()" of the recent TranslationModel to translate labels into the current language.

Parameters:
key - The key identifying the text to be translated.
Returns:
The translated text.

getCategoryEntries

public List<InputListenerAdapter.CategoryEntry> getCategoryEntries()
Returns the currently available categories as a list of InputListenerAdapter.CategoryEntry objects. The list is created from the settings of the current category model.

Returns:
a list representing all categories

setCategoryModel

public void setCategoryModel(CategoryModel categoryModel)
Sets the category model to a new value. This method is used by the jsf managed property injection mechanism.

Parameters:
categoryModel - the new category model

applyFilterTriggered

public void applyFilterTriggered(ActionEvent e)
Is called when the users wants to apply a new category filter. The method converts the new category entries set by jsf to a set containing all currently active categories and passes the set to the currently used InputListener bean.

Parameters:
e - an action event generated by jsf
